snippet: Audi Chief Executive Rupert Stadler has stepped down from leadership roles at the Piech family foundation, Austrian company filings showed....

headline.main: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains
headline.print_headline: Peak Gasoline Demand Looms With Engine Efficiency Gains

lead_paragraph: Audi Chief Executive Rupert Stadler has stepped down from leadership roles at the Piech family foundation, Austrian company filings showed.
